name: Snow Question
description:
An unusual situation for a mathematician who has fallen down a snow slide. He rolls down and with the help of math tries to guess the direction of the snowball. If he doesn't get the direction right, the snowball will get bigger and then he will definitely crash.

Snow Question is a 2D math game where a math teacher is stuck in a snowball that you play as. He is trying to guess the right direction with his calculations. Try to steer the coma towards the snowflake with the correct solution to the equation.

Features of the game:
- Visual style
- Difficult passing
- Music
